name: Elysium
description: 3D CAD to CAD Data Translation Software
overview: Elysium Co., Ltd, is a software company specializing in the handling of 3D geometry. Founded in 1999, Elysium Co., Ltd is a privately-held company with headquarters in Hamamatsu, Japan. The unmatched quality and performance of Elysium’ s solutions and interoperability among Point Cloud, Polygon and CAD are highly valued among its customers and partners. The company’ s technology has been refined through close partnerships with the worldâ€™s major CAD software vendors like Autodesk, Parametric Technology, Siemens PLM Software, SolidWorks and Dassault Systemes, and strong relationships with hundreds of customers worldwide. In fact, most Japanese automotive manufacturers, auto parts manufacturers, and consumer-electronics manufacturers have adopted Elysium’ s products for every stage of product development and data management. Of course, the company’ s market is not limited to Japan. Today, Elysium Co.,Ltd has extended its global presence to North America, Southeast Asia and in Europe.

acquisitions.source_description: Company Announces Exclusive Strategic Partnership With Leading Internet Weight Loss Company
